titles.title: In The Presence Of The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In the presence of the Lord
There is fullness of joy,
Fullness of joy, fullness of joy.
(Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All the earth shall be filled with His glory.
All the earth shall be filled with His light.
All the earth shall be filled with His glory.
A cloud by day and a pillar by night.
